ValidationRule.description: Close Date cannot be in past, if stage is not closed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( !$User.IsBypassVR__c, IsClosed = FALSE, CloseDate < TODAY(), OR( ISCHANGED(IsClosed), ISCHANGED(StageName)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Close Date cannot be in past, if stage is not closed. [VR28]
